metadata.description:
I'm beyond excited to present "Break The Tension" as my Genesis track on Sound. 

Break The Tension is a smooth R&B track written, produced and performed by myself. Created back in 2021 this song talks about the a particular instance between two people slowly building up powerful feelings for one another, to the point where there is only one direction to go. Seizing the moment, action is finally taken and the release of the intense build up results in an eclectic emotional and physical experience, finally feeling free around one another. 

My musical journey has been building up for some time and as this new year has started I am excited, inspired, and more ready than ever to share my art with the world. Thank you for being apart of this journey. 

- Max

lyrics.text:
Summer nights
Twenty five 
Talking 'til the morning rises
Blurry eyes
Focused on you
Focused on you

Yeah taking my hands
I’m touching your body
You say not to stop it
Girl I understand
That deeper connection we’ve got going on too
Girl tell me what you wanna do

Cause up to this moment
We’ve been chilling
Flipped like a switch and I owned it
For a minute
We got lost in all of our feelings
City view turned to the ceiling
Finally ran out of the reasons
Not to do it

So let’s not waste any time
With your body next to mine
We can finally break the tension
I’ll give you all of my attention

As I lay with you
Heavy breathing fills up the room
Diving in the energy’s kinetic
The way you move’s poetic
You’re nothing short of angelic
And you're touching on me like you’re ready to get it

Now I’m tying you up with your hands by your back
We’re breaking the bed and your throwing it back
I'm not gonna lie you’re the best I’ve ever had
Oh over had had had

So let’s not waste any time
With your body next to mine
We can finally break the tension
I’ll give you all of my attention

So let’s not waste any time
With your body next to mine
We can finally break the tension
I’ll give you all of my attention
